comments.body:
Just a note, nothing to do here. Ideally we would include both licenses, but there is not a mechanism for that currently.

xref: https://github.com/conda/conda-build/issues/1247
Yeah, I was searching for it, but there is no mechanism. Ideally the upstream package should consolidate the License information.
Yeah, some of them chose things like a license directory (e.g. matplotlib), which seems sensible.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +50,54 @@  license_family: BSD
  # Additional licencing information in LICENSE as well
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: "Theora is a free and open video compression format from the Xiph.org Foundation."
